# Instagram Video Download

## Instagram Video Downloader - Download Instagram videos in Full HD quality
**Paste  **Download** 
## SaveGram: Tool to download Instagram videos in the highest quality
Want to save and download your favorite Instagram videos? **SaveGram** is a great tool that allows downloading Instagram videos easily and quickly. With just a few simple steps, this tool will help you download any Instagram video to your phone or computer without any hassle.
Our Instagram video downloader was developed to help Instagram users download videos easily. This tool is compatible with any device from PC, tablet to mobile phone (iPhone, Android), helping you download your favorite videos from Instagram without installing any other supporting software.
Why is SaveGram the best downloader? Our Instagram video downloader is easy to use and requires no software installation, Just go to SaveGram.app website and paste the video link you want to download into the input box and press the "Download" button. Save and download Instagram videos with just one click.

### How to download Instagram videos easily and quickly


- Step 1: First, open the Instagram app or Instagram.com website in your browser.

- Step 2: On Instagram, open the video you want to download, tap the three dots icon (‚óè‚óè‚óè) and select Copy link.

- Step 3: Go back to SaveGram.App, paste the copied video link and input field and press the Download button.

- Step 4: Wait for our server to process and display the download link. You can now save the video to your device.


### Why is SaveGram the best Instagram Video Downloader?
You don't need to install any software or extensions. This tool is used through a web browser, supporting downloading and saving Instagram videos on the web browser. In particular, this tool is completely free, with no limits on features or number of downloads.
Our Instagram video downloader is extremely easy to use, helping you save your favorite videos from Instagram in just a few seconds. What are you waiting for? Try our service now!

### Can I use SaveGram to download videos from Instagram to my iPhone or iPad?
Sure. SaveGram is a tool that works in a web browser. So, this tool supports all devices including iPhone and iPad. Just visit the SaveGram.app website in your browser to download Instagram videos to your iPhone or iPad easily and quickly ([How to download Instagram videos on iPhone](https://savegram.app/en/how-to-download-video-from-instagram-on-iphone)).
SaveGram.App is designed to help you download videos or images from your own Instagram account. We will refuse service if you use our tool to infringe on the privacy or copyright of others.
